Activity: Arrive at the office, check emails, and review the progress of the compliance monitoring system implementation. Respond to any urgent emails.

Continue implementing compliance monitoring systems. Focus on setting up alerts and reports to track investor interactions, such as onboarding, KYC/AML checks, and suitability assessments. Email @ONBD-1 to ask for a list of the information they collect.
Continue implementing compliance monitoring systems, integrating data from the onboarding system. Create a dashboard to view all compliance information.
Lunch Break. Read industry articles online.

Collaborate with @larch-1 and @devops-1 to ensure the compliance monitoring systems are properly integrated with the fund's trading platform and data infrastructure. Discuss data feeds, API access, and system security.
Document the configuration of the compliance monitoring systems, including alerts, reports, and user access controls. Create a user manual for the system.
Test the compliance monitoring systems to ensure they are functioning correctly. Verify that alerts are being triggered appropriately and that reports are accurate. Document testing results.
End of day. Organize desk and head home.
